alert.note: Alert for East Becker; East Marshall; East Otter Tail; East Polk; Grant; Hubbard; Lake Of The Woods; Mahnomen; North Beltrami; North Clearwater; Pennington; Red Lake; Roseau; South Beltrami; South Clearwater; Wadena; West Becker; West Otter Tail (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 14 at 2:00PM CST until December 15 at 3:00AM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM CST THURSDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 9 PM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches Thursday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, light snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch through Wednesday evening. * WHERE...Portions of central, north central, northwest and west central Minnesota. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, from 3 AM to 9 PM CST Thursday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 3 AM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult. Heavy snow rates will significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning commute Thursday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at dot.nd.gov/travel and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.
